title: 103 - How To Survive On A Deserted Island With 4 Items Or Less
description: On today's show, the boys discuss their long Thanksgiving weekend's and how some of the boys are already getting their houses decked out with Christmas decorations and dive into a loaded Pod FOD including Nick's new love of Harry Potter movies, Lowe's letting dogs run roughshod down their aisles, Vin Diesel v. John Cena in both the new Fast and Furious movie and potentially on the moon, what 4 items the guys would choose if they needed to survive on a deserted island, they try to help out a female listener with an unusual question, chat about the eventual showdown between Godzilla & King Kong, and much more. Don't forget to subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow and become a member of McAfee's Mafia to watch full episodes of The Pod on Youtube. Make sure you submit your questions to @ThePodPMI on Twitter and Instagram to be featured on the show. We appreciate you all for listening, we'll see you Friday.
dc:creator: The Pod
